name: Combo Balls Pop Pop
description:
Clear bubbles and beat the incredible challenges of Combo Balls Pop Pop game! There are hundreds of amazing levels to explore, packed with cool puzzles and colored bubbles.
Features:
-Objectives differ in more than 200 amazing levels
-Aim and tap to shoot bubbles
-Pop bubbles strategically to make more combos and power-ups
-Save all the lovely chickens to level up
-Exquisite game interface
